price: 17. Ee sidee baad isaga celin (cadaabka), haddaad gaalowdaan Maalin ka dhigi carruurta cirroole.
arabic: فَكَيۡفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرۡتُمۡ يَوۡمٗا يَجۡعَلُ ٱلۡوِلۡدَٰنَ شِيبًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fakayfa tattaqūna in kafartum yawman yajʿalu al-wil'dāna shīban
